class_notes: Study Abroad. Course meets abroad from May 29 - July 2, 2022. Apply online at studyabroad.emory.edu
course_description: This course aims to further develop communication skills in Portuguese and expand knowledge of Luso-Afro-Braz cultural traditions, playing close attention to Lisbon, as a space of cultural and linguistic artistic encounters. This course is designed to interweave the arts and language acquisition.
prerequisites: PORT 102 or PORT 110 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 1365, Section #: 900, Type: ABR, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: A. Teixeira, Status: Open
